name: Heinrich Karl Bukowski (later anglicized to Henry Charles Bukowski)
influences: Anton Chekhov, James Thurber, Franz Kafka, Knut Hamsun, Ernest Hemingway, John Fante, Louis-Ferdinand Céline, Robinson Jeffers, Fyodor Dostoyevsky, D. H. Lawrence, Ezra Pound, Conrad Aiken, Sherwood Anderson, Catullus, Li Po, Antonin Artaud |
